rows.label: tlk70000063_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, have you lot come to hear more
about my research on ether miasmas?
Fascinating stuff, I know.

rows.label: tlk70000063_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm always happy to ramble about my
ideas. Especially to Blades who can
control the flow of ether...

rows.label: tlk70000063_01_msg0003
rows.name:
But where was I? Oh, right. Ether
miasmas are emitted by the Divine Beasts as a
form of waste product. Yummy.

rows.label: tlk70000063_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Stabilizing the flow of ether around
a miasma is the key to its removal.
Are you following me so far?

rows.label: tlk70000063_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Good! So, thanks to the self-purifying
power of the Divine Beasts, the miasma is
dispersed naturally in the air.

rows.label: tlk70000063_01_msg0006
rows.name:
If you connect the dots, this means that
to get rid of the miasma, you need the
means to control ether itself.

rows.label: tlk70000063_01_msg0007
rows.name:
That's probably enough rambling for
now. Come find me again if you lot ever
want to hear more.
